answers.answer: Unfortunately, it is difficult to tell you exactly how much time he has left, but it definitely does not sound like alot.  This could last for days to months, but I would have to say probably days.Be there for him when you can and keep him comfortable at this point.I wish you all the best dealing with this unfortunate situation.

question: Hi All,My father was diagnosed with Stage IV prostate cancer 3 years ago.  We had to send him to the hospital 3 weeks ago because he became very weak due to the cancer and diabetes.  His bodily functions are starting to deteriorate. He is drinking out of a tube and is under several medications.  He's unconcious for most of the time.  There is another tube to help him pee.  Last week the doctor said he could go home soon, but this week, they want him to stay longer.How much time do we really have left? The doctor is not able to say anything concrete.
title: Near death prostate cancer
